{{Description|Xinyan insists that these pyrotechnics are the apex of performative art, and that they are physical phenomena that have nothing to do with her [[Vision]].}}
'''Sweeping Fervor''' is [[Xinyan]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|initial swing|4}}
* Triggering higher level shields by hitting enemies is ping-dependent, with higher ping (usually over 100) making it inconsistent.
* The damage-over-time (DoT) effect on the Shield ticks every 2 seconds. If the shield lasts 12 seconds, this will deal damage 6 times.
** If the shield is broken by enemy damage, the DoT effect will also end.
* Xinyan will briefly gain the {{Pyro}} status upon casting this skill. While the shield is active, it will also apply {{Pyro}} briefly to any character that takes the field.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Xinyan|talent=Sweeping Fervor|ascension|1|"The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."|Decreases the number of enemies that Sweeping Fervor must hit to activate Shield Level 2: Lead-In and Shield Level 3: Rave to 1 enemy and 2 enemies, respectively.}}
* {{Talent Note|character=Xinyan|talent=Sweeping Fervor|ascension|2|"...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Impromptu Opening}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Double-Stop}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Wildfire Rhythm}}
